meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Mary Linnenbringer Zack Azzam Tom Kunzen Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6109.

td.p: Mary Linnenbringer, a floral designer from St. Louis, Missouri
Zack Azzam, a bank branch manager from Bloomfield Hills, Michigan
Tom Kunzen, a geotechnical engineer from Orlando, Florida (whose 2-day cash winnings total $58,400)

tr.td: DESCRIBING THE ARTWORK
COUNTRY FEMALE VOCALIST OF THE YEAR GRAMMYS
YOU ARE SO OUTTA HERE
AVIATION
FACTS FROM THE WORLD ALMANAC
IN THE MI"DD"LE
(Alex: A double "D" will come up in the middle of each correct response.)
